Bradley, Todd wrote:

> David Saff wrote:
>
> > public void <T> assertThat (T obj, Constraint<T> constraint);
>
> Shouldn't the arguments be in the opposite order, for
> consistency with the other assert* methods?  The rest
> of them are always (thing I want, thing I got).

Good point.  There is a reason.  Read this out loud, and you might see 
why the flip feels right:

assertThat(x, isLessThan(5));

    David Saff
